text: Varkaus is a town in Northern Savonia, Finland. As of January 2014 Varkaus had a population almost of 22,100 people. Neighbouring municipalities are Heinävesi, Joroinen, Leppävirta, Rantasalmi and Savonlinna. The former municipality of Kangaslampi was merged with Varkaus on 1 January 2005. In Joroinen is a small airport called Varkauden lenteasema. == Other websites == * Website, finnish, english and in russian Category:Municipalities of North Savo
title: Varkaus
